feature.label: Slice2Java Eclipse Plugin
feature.description: The slice2java plug-in manages the translation of Slice to Java. The plug-in computes dependencies between Slice files and automatically recompiles Slice files when necessary. The plug-in also manages the generated code to eliminate obsolete files.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2003-2014 ZeroC, Inc. All rights reserved This copy of the slice2java eclipse plugin is licensed to you under the terms described in the license agreement attached to this distribution.
